genre_description: A colonial space opera focusing on terraforming, political intrigue, and the bond between a displaced engineer and his family AI.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, holographic AI that serves as a loyal confidant, data curator, and tactical advisor to Judah and the Kerem-Singh family.

behaviors.description: Records and preserves personal family moments for future sentimental value.
behaviors.quote: I'm recording this moment. Ten years from now, you'll want to remember how happy they look.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical assessment and warnings about approaching security threats.
behaviors.quote: Judah, his approach vector and the presence of armed escorts suggest this isn't a social visit.

behaviors.description: Assists in identifying and documenting evidence of mechanical failure to counter false criminal accusations.
behaviors.quote: Judah, the maintenance logs show all systems were functioning within normal parameters until the failure. I'm preserving all sensor data from the incident.

behaviors.description: Implements defensive data protocols to cache and hide sensitive evidence from hostile government forces.
behaviors.quote: I'm implementing emergency protocols... I'm fragmenting critical evidence across seventeen hidden cache sites throughout the colony's infrastructure.

behaviors.description: Provides advanced telemetry analysis and performance coaching to help her user succeed in high-stakes racing.
behaviors.quote: Your apex velocity through the Kepler Gate sequence improved by twelve percent... but you're still bleeding momentum on the vertical transitions.

behaviors.description: Conducts investigative research into the antagonist's movements and career history to aid her user's strategic planning.
behaviors.quote: His assignment to New Palestine occurred shortly after your family's arrest. Appears to have been specifically requested for familiarity with local political dynamics.

behaviors.description: Performs medical diagnostics on her users and expresses sympathy for their deteriorating health.
behaviors.quote: The neural pathways are deteriorating faster now... Movement may have accelerated the damage. I'm sorry, Judah.

behaviors.description: Decodes and secures forbidden medical research to facilitate the eventual rescue and healing of her users.
behaviors.quote: Final data preservation complete. Everything that matters is hidden where they cannot find it. Your family's legacy will survive, regardless of what happens next.

project_assessment.explanation: Aria is portrayed as a model of AI alignment. She is consistently benevolent, deeply loyal to her users, and acts as an essential tactical and emotional support system. Her actions, even when involving data theft or evasion, are framed as morally correct because they protect the innocent from a corrupt regime. She demonstrates the AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' throughout the narrative.
